meanings.definition: The quality or state of being translucent or allowing light to pass through.
meanings.sent1: The lucency of the glass allowed sunlight to brighten the room.
meanings.sent2: The lake's lucency made it easy to see the fish swimming below.
meanings.sent3: The lucency of the ice cream made it look like a delicious crystal.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes had a lucency that seemed to reveal her innermost thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The lucency of the diamond sparkled in the sunlight, mesmerizing all who saw it.

meanings.sent1: The lucency of the water allowed us to see the colorful fish below.
meanings.sent2: The lucency of the window made the view of the garden crystal clear.
meanings.sent3: The lucency of the plastic bag made it seem like a floating ghost.
meanings.sent4: The lucency of her intentions was evident in her honest eyes.
meanings.sent5: The lucency of the crystal vase made the flowers inside appear even more vibrant.
